title: The unaddressed FPS Nightmare
body:
STILL HAPPENING! and I have a new record of 2!!! Fps in team fight, it was absolutely unacceptable, this is Poor service..... Riot ....get your team together and FIX YO CLIENT FOOS!!   

When the old Client was still around I could play and had ZERO problems so I stayed with it and while I played, everyone I played with was having these same issues, THEN you Geniuses FORCE  EVERYONE to take that client that ruins lives... and shove it in our Faces.    This is 100% on your end and I only just got back to check on LOL cause I LOVE it and still has the WORST FPS situation...    And Like everyone else... I can play ANY game out there ANY and it works smooth as Eggs as David Chapelle says.    League? terrible the worst!    


Are you TRYING to dismantle this community?
Do you want the game to fail?
Do you just not care like the Trump admin?
Should we expect you to drive a pipeline in our living rooms soon and Frack our mothers?

Cause let me tell you I wont be surprised when you do. 

Please give us the option to use the old client again. there is no reason to not have it available...{{item:1051}}  I'm throwing down the Gauntlet... Do you care to pick it up?

   Sincerely Frustrated, Still hopeful and ever present,
                                                          Santosha Anahata
